sentences.english: In addition, the design of labyrinth and the two protection doors in cyclotron rooms were conservative.
sentences.chinese: 迴旋加速器室兩道防護門和迷道長度的設計是保守的。

sentences.english: This article discusses the characteristics of cyclotron prototyping model.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了迴旋加速器虛擬樣機模型的特點。

sentences.english: The destruction of Greenred's love and youth mirrors the irretrievable tragedy of one generation.
sentences.chinese: 青紅愛情與青春的毀滅折射出一代人無法迴旋的悲劇。

sentences.english: The developments of cyclotrons are outlined.
sentences.chinese: 五十年來，迴旋加速器有了很大發展。

sentences.english: I was playing a so beautiful rondo that even when it accomplished I was still immersed in it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一首優美的迴旋曲，曲終我仍沉浸其中。

sentences.english: He sliced the ball, and it bounced back over the net.
sentences.chinese: 他踢出一記迴旋球，球彈到球網上彈了回來。

sentences.english: Absolute instability is a major physics limitation in the realization of the ultimate capability of gyro-traveling-wave tube.
sentences.chinese: 絕對不穩定性是制約迴旋行波管性能的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: A complex-cavity gyrotron is analysed and calculated in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對複合腔迴旋管進行了分析與計算。

sentences.english: After the completion of the turn, the horse is brought back to the track in a forward sideward manner before the second halt.
sentences.chinese: 在完成迴旋之後，將馬往側前方帶回到蹄跡線才立定。

sentences.english: They noted a better muscular development in the rotator muscles of the shoulders and the pectoralis major.
sentences.chinese: 表明肩部的迴旋肌和大胸肌發育更好。

sentences.english: More backspin will slow the ball down and let it drop into the court.
sentences.chinese: 更多的迴旋會減球速，使它掉進場內。

sentences.english: Some said the light wasn't moving, just hovering.
sentences.chinese: 還有人說光柱沒有移動，只是在空中迴旋。

sentences.english: That will severely limit Obama's room for manoeuvre at the Copenhagen talks.
sentences.chinese: 這將嚴重限制了奧巴馬在哥本哈根談判中的迴旋餘地。

sentences.english: The night wind revelves in the sky and sings.
sentences.chinese: 夜風在天空中迴旋並歌唱。

sentences.english: This bipartisanship may give him leeway to set a new course.
sentences.chinese: 兩黨合作可能讓他獲得制定新方向的迴旋餘地。

sentences.english: All these thoughts whirled through his brain.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些想法都在他的腦子裏迴旋。

definition: to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
